mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IMG = #{pImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
